titles.title: Overseas Military Facility Structure Review Act of 2003
A bill to establish a commission to assess the military facility structure of the United States overseas, and for other purposes.
Overseas Military Facility Structure Review Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Overseas Military Facility Structure Review Act of 2003 - Establishes the Commission on the Review of the Overseas Military Facility Structure of the United States to: (1) study matters relating to the military facility structure of the United States overseas; and (2) report review results to the President and Congress, including a proposal for an overseas basing strategy to meet current and future mission requirements of the Department of Defense.
